name: eggd_plot_variant_baf
title: eggd_plot_variant_baf
summary: Plot BAF and Depth with Karyoploter

changeLog.description: Make app more flexible (remove hardcoded inputs). Improve plotting symmetry.

inputSpec.name: min_baf
inputSpec.label: Minimum BAF
inputSpec.help: Minimum BAF for BAF plot. Default is 0.04

inputSpec.name: max_baf
inputSpec.label: Maximum BAF
inputSpec.help: Maximum BAF for BAF plot. Default is 0.96

inputSpec.name: max_depth
inputSpec.label: Maximum depth
inputSpec.help: Maximum depth (percentile) for plotting. Default is 0.9 (90%)

inputSpec.name: min_depth
inputSpec.label: Minimum depth
inputSpec.help: Minimum depth for plotting. Default is 5

inputSpec.name: bin_size
inputSpec.label: Bin size
inputSpec.help: Bin size to use for plotting depth (reduces noise). By default, scale down by a factor of 3000.

inputSpec.name: chr_names
inputSpec.label: Chromosome names
inputSpec.help: Chromosome names used for axis labels

inputSpec.name: genome
inputSpec.label: Genome build
inputSpec.help: Genome build for plotting (eg. hg19, hg38). Default is hg19

inputSpec.name: symmetry
inputSpec.label: Symmetrical BAF plot
inputSpec.help: Whether to plot symmetrical points on the BAF plot. Default is True.

inputSpec.name: output_tsv
inputSpec.label: Output TSV
inputSpec.help: Whether to output a TSV file of the BAF dataframe for testing purposes. Default is False.
